Text: Are all the cards supposed to be unlocked? I've never played Magic before, but I thought that you had to unlock all the cards by winning matches. Is there any way to re-lock them lol? Kind of ruins single player.

Here's what I did to start a game without any unlocked cards:
From SKIDROW crack I copied just skidrow.ini and magic_2012.exe to game folder, and launched steam (smartsteam also worked).
After that, I started magic_2012.exe.
Hopefully all will be well and saved, I'm off to play now.
Happy gaming!
To play with card unlocked. You have to have steam running. Just copy the Magic.exe crack over to your dir. and start the game. Saves work for me.

Hey ive got the same problem as Trixter, i installed the game, copied over the crack and now when i try open the game a get a error message that says : The program could not start because of a missing file called "X3DAudio1_7.dll" . Anyone know how to fix this?

potentially has a virus, just installed this on another computer and it blue screened and crashed out. i also have recently had a trojan. scan and check this file carefully especially the direct x files which were the last thing installed . 

but as i said 'potentially' im unsure. 

apart from from that this is excellent. if anyone is having problems such as missing files it is probably the direct x which needs to be updated. just dont do it from the file included in this download for safety precautions , unless im wrong about the virus :)
